main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object that appeared as a round, silver object about 30 to 40 feet in diameter, moving at a high speed in Van Nuys, California on April 6, 1955.
interesting points: The object was hovering at an altitude of approximately 500 feet.,Witnesses reported seeing a bright light in the sky that changed colors.,At least two sightings of similar objects were reported in the area around the same date.,The object was reportedly identical to a scheduled United Airlines flight with a red rotating beacon.,Sighting was observed by military personnel as well as civilians over several occurrences.
witness description: military personnel and civilians in the area
